mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cartno, memberno, productsno, cnt, selected, rdate) VALUES(cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberno}, #{productsno}, #{cnt}, #{selected}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT C.cartno, C.memberno, C.productsno, C.cnt, C.rdate, P.productsno AS "productsVO.productsno", P.title AS "productsVO.title", P.thumb1 AS "productsVO.thumb1", P.saleprice AS "productsVO.saleprice", P.dc AS "productsVO.dc", P.expdate AS "productsVO.expdate" FROM cart C JOIN products P ON C.productsno = P.productsno WHERE C.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY C.cartno DESC
SELECT * FROM cart WHERE memberno = #{memberno} AND productsno = #{productsno}
SELECT NVL(SUM(P.saleprice * C.cnt), 0) FROM cart C JOIN products P ON C.productsno = P.productsno WHERE C.memberno = #{memberno}
